hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GITHUB_ORG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user/org of the GitHub repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REMOTE_REF
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The remote portion of the Git refspec to fetch and test | examples: refs/heads/:branch | refs/pull/:pr-number/head

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REBASE_ONTO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optionally, rebase onto the given ref before testing. Leave blank to skip rebasing. | examples: origin/master

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: NODES_SUBSET
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The subset of nodes to run tests on

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CITGM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
what citgm should npm install
npm install -g $CITGM
Can be replaced with any npm compatible path

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CITGM_COMMAND
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Command to be executed
For parallel e.x. citgm-all -J
If you want to test a specific module
e.x. citgm omg-i-pass # this too shall pass

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd node if [ -n "${REBASE_ONTO}" ]; then git --version git status git rev-parse HEAD git rev-parse $REBASE_ONTO
git config --replace-all user.name Dummy git config --replace-all user.email dummy@dummy.com git config user.name git config user.email echo $GIT_COMMITTER_NAME echo $GIT_AUTHOR_NAME
git rebase --abort || true git checkout -B _jenkins_rebase_branch git rebase --committer-date-is-author-date $REBASE_ONTO
git status git rev-parse HEAD fi

#!/bin/bash -x cd node NODE_VERSION=$(python tools/getnodeversion.py)
CONFIG_FLAGS="--with-intl=small-icu --download=all --download-path=${HOME}/node-icu/" mkdir -p ${HOME}/node-icu/ if [[ $NODE_VERSION =~ ^0\.10 ]]; then CONFIG_FLAGS="" fi rm -rf "$WORKSPACE"/smoker mkdir "$WORKSPACE"/smoker
if [ `uname -s` = "AIX" ]; then MAKE=gmake unset LIBPATH echo $LIBPATH export CC=gcc else MAKE=make fi
python ./configure --prefix="$WORKSPACE"/smoker $CONFIG_FLAGS $MAKE -j $(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN 2>/dev/null || echo 20) $MAKE install

cd smoker
export PATH=$(pwd)/bin:$PATH
node -v npm -v npm set progress=false npm set cache="$WORKSPACE/npm_cache"
if [ `uname -s` = "AIX" ]; then export npm_config_tmp='/ramdisk0/citgm' export npm_config_nodedir='/ramdisk0/citgm' fi
npm install --prefix=$(pwd) --global --loglevel=error $CITGM

cd smoker
export PATH=$(pwd)/bin:$PATH retval=0
export npm_loglevel=error export npm_config_nodedir="$WORKSPACE/node"
temp="$WORKSPACE"/citgm_tmp if [ `uname -s` = "AIX" ]; then temp=/ramdisk0/citgm export npm_config_tmp='/ramdisk0/citgm' unset LIBPATH echo $LIBPATH export CC=gcc fi rm -rf $temp || true mkdir $temp || true
[ "$DISABLE_READABLE_STREAM" == "true" ] && export READABLE_STREAM=disable
$CITGM_COMMAND --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir -v $CITGM_LOGLEVEL -x $PWD/report.xml -q $NPM_LOGLEVEL --tmpDir $temp

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
TASKKILL /F /IM node.exe /T || TRUE TASKKILL /F /IM cctest.exe /T || TRUE TASKKILL /F /IM run-tests.exe /T || TRUE
:: smoker dir is only for the report, Release is used to run because there's no make install rm -rf smoker mkdir smoker if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
cd node IF DEFINED REBASE_ONTO ( git --version git status git rev-parse HEAD git rev-parse %REBASE_ONTO%
git config --replace-all user.name Dummy git config --replace-all user.email dummy@dummy.com git config user.name git config user.email echo %GIT_COMMITTER_NAME% echo %GIT_AUTHOR_NAME%
git rebase --abort git checkout -B _jenkins_rebase_branch git rebase --committer-date-is-author-date %REBASE_ONTO%
git status git rev-parse HEAD ) call vcbuild release nosign x64 if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% echo on
set "PATH=%WORKSPACE%\node\Release;%PATH%"
mkdir Release\node_modules robocopy /e deps\npm Release\node_modules\npm copy deps\npm\bin\npm.cmd Release cd ..
SET "npm_config_userconfig=%WORKSPACE%\node\Release\npmrc" SET "npm_config_cache=%WORKSPACE%\node\Release\npm-cache" SET "npm_config_progress=false" SET "npm_config_nodedir=%WORKSPACE%\node" SET "npm_config_python=python2.7" SET "npm_loglevel=error"
echo Node version: call node -v echo NPM version: call npm -v echo on
::call npm config list -l ::echo on
cd node\Release ls
call npm install --prefix=%WORKSPACE%\node\Release --global --loglevel=error %CITGM% if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% echo on
if %DISABLE_READABLE_STREAM% equ true set "READABLE_STREAM=disable"
call %CITGM_COMMAND% -v %CITGM_LOGLEVEL% -x %WORKSPACE%/smoker/report.xml -q %NPM_LOGLEVEL% if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel% echo on
TASKKILL /F /IM node.exe /T || TRUE TASKKILL /F /IM cctest.exe /T || TRUE TASKKILL /F /IM run-tests.exe /T || TRUE
